import numpy as np 
import pandas as pd 
import seaborn as sns 
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.a3af0373:
AnnualTicketSales = pd.read_csv(r"../input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/AnnualTicketSales.csv")
HighestGrossers = pd.read_csv(r"../input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/HighestGrossers.csv")
PopularCreativeTypes = pd.read_csv(r"../input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/PopularCreativeTypes.csv")
TopDistributors = pd.read_csv(r"../input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/TopDistributors.csv")
TopGenres = pd.read_csv(r"../input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/TopGenres.csv")
TopGrossingRatings = pd.read_csv(r"../input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/TopGrossingRatings.csv")
TopGrossingRatings = pd.read_csv(r"../input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/TopGrossingRatings.csv")
TopProductionMethods = pd.read_csv(r"../input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/TopProductionMethods.csv")
WideReleasesCount = pd.read_csv(r"../input/hollywood-theatrical-market-synopsis-1995-to-2021/WideReleasesCount.csv")
source.d46f74e6:
AnnualTicketSales['TOTAL BOX OFFICE'] = AnnualTicketSales['TOTAL BOX OFFICE'].str.replace(',', '')
AnnualTicketSales['TOTAL BOX OFFICE'] = AnnualTicketSales['TOTAL BOX OFFICE'].str.replace('$', '')
AnnualTicketSales['TICKETS SOLD'] = AnnualTicketSales['TICKETS SOLD'].str.replace(',', '')

AnnualTicketSales['TICKETS SOLD'] = AnnualTicketSales['TICKETS SOLD'].str.replace('$', '')

AnnualTicketSales['TOTAL INFLATION ADJUSTED BOX OFFICE'] = AnnualTicketSales['TOTAL INFLATION ADJUSTED BOX OFFICE'].str.replace(',', '')
AnnualTicketSales['TOTAL INFLATION ADJUSTED BOX OFFICE'] = AnnualTicketSales['TOTAL INFLATION ADJUSTED BOX OFFICE'].str.replace('$', '')

AnnualTicketSales['AVERAGE TICKET PRICE'] = AnnualTicketSales['AVERAGE TICKET PRICE'].str.replace('$', '')

AnnualTicketSales.drop('Unnamed: 5', axis = 1 , inplace = True)
source.b3fdd506: AnnualTicketSales = AnnualTicketSales.astype({"TOTAL BOX OFFICE":'int64','TICKETS SOLD':'int64','TOTAL INFLATION ADJUSTED BOX OFFICE':'int64'})
source.1c254466:
ax = sns.catplot(y="TICKETS SOLD", x="YEAR", kind="bar", data=AnnualTicketSales, height=6, aspect=3)
plt.ylabel("TICKETS SOLD in billion")
plt.grid(True)
source.e6ccf57c:
ax = sns.catplot(y="TOTAL BOX OFFICE", x="YEAR", kind="bar", data=AnnualTicketSales, height=6, aspect=3)
plt.ylabel("TOTAL BOX OFFICE in")
plt.grid(True)
source.ac7069e5:
HighestGrossers['TOTAL FOR YEAR'] = HighestGrossers['TOTAL FOR YEAR'].str.replace(',', '')
HighestGrossers['TOTAL FOR YEAR'] = HighestGrossers['TOTAL FOR YEAR'].str.replace('$', '')

HighestGrossers["TOTAL FOR YEAR"] = HighestGrossers["TOTAL FOR YEAR"].astype(str).astype(int)
source.eed17358:
df1 = pd.DataFrame(HighestGrossers, columns = ['MOVIE','TOTAL FOR YEAR'])
df1.sort_values(by=['TOTAL FOR YEAR'], ascending = False,inplace=True)
source.9cec19c7:
TopGenres['TOTAL GROSS'] = TopGenres['TOTAL GROSS'].str.replace(',', '')
TopGenres['TOTAL GROSS'] = TopGenres['TOTAL GROSS'].str.replace('$', '')
source.fc6a66ba:
ax = sns.catplot(y="TOTAL GROSS", x="GENRES", kind="bar", data=TopGenres, height=6, aspect=3)
